projects.name: Freelance Collaboration Space
projects.description: Developed an online platform using React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express, and Vite. The platform connects clients with freelancers, offering streamlined project management and communication, with a user-friendly interface designed to foster productive collaborations.

projects.name: FeedB
projects.description: Built a mini backend project with Node.js and Express, allowing users to post feedback and display them. Implemented a like feature using MongoDB for data storage, showcasing data association for efficient retrieval.

projects.name: CodeSync Hub
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application that consolidates user profiles from various coding platforms into a single dashboard. Employed Selenium and BeautifulSoup for web scraping, with a React frontend, Node.js backend, Tailwind CSS styling, and Firebase authentication.

projects.name: Face Detection and Recognition
projects.description: Developed a machine learning project for image classification using a custom dataset of 35 individuals with 100 facial images each. Trained a CNN model using TensorFlow and Keras for accurate facial recognition, predicting the person in a given photo.

experiences.description: Completed a 6-week internship focused on Artificial Intelligence, under the mentorship of IBM and Edunet. Developed a project utilizing a labeled dataset, exploring and evaluating various machine learning algorithms for performance comparison.

full_output.name: Shaik Abdul Rahim
achievements_and_awards: Secured 2nd place in CodeClash coding contest at SRM University.
